column4: hrmm can anyone think of a reason why totem is not showing video ? only sound?
seems if I install totem-xine totem-gstreamer (which I dont think I care about) must be removed but then also ubuntu desktop!  ?
installing totem-zine will handle removing totem-gstreamer and ubuntu-desktop isn't a "real" package but i'm brain farting and can't think what kinda package it is, it's like smbolic or something
so it wont remove anything important? like ubuntu images or something? gdm or whatever?
hehe though now its showing video and no sound! :P
ugh not good... did an error box pop up by chance saying the sound is in use?
not sure now... worked fine for me :/
that is so lame if I install totem-xine I get video and no sound, if I install totem-gstreamer I get sound and no video!
I wonder if there is a way to tell totem what audio to use visavi esd
